WRITING.TEXT: Is that a chunk error or did you hollow that out?
Youtube it but basically humans try to survive while the zombies try and catch the humans to make them zombies. Cool part is humans hold the zombies off using nerf guns and rolled up socks.

WRITING.TITLE: UoN game of Humans vs Zombies
WRITING.TEXT: I remember a couple of years ago that there was the possibility of a game of Humans vs Zombies to be played at Newcastle Uni. I seriously want this to be a thing and would love to get it running. Anyone keen?
Failing that there is always wiziwig.com which will stream all the games.
It stands for Red Vs Blue. It is a Web series made entirely using Halo by a company called Rooster teeth. Really funny show, they have 11 seasons out with a 12th on the way.
